about_the_game:
The NASCAR Heat 2 – September Jumbo Expansion is chock-full of additional paint schemes from both the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series and XFINITY Series! This pack includes over 45 new paint schemes, 3 new challenges, and 50 state flag decals for you to add to your custom car! Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Austin Dillon #3 Dow Patriotic Chevrolet
Dale Earnhardt #88 Nationwide Patriotic Chevrolet
…

NXS:
William Byron #9 Axalta Patriotic Chevrolet
Darrell Wallace Jr. #6 Globe Life Patriotic
…

Plus, many more!
detailed_description:
The NASCAR Heat 2 – September Jumbo Expansion is chock-full of additional paint schemes from both the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series and XFINITY Series! This pack includes over 45 new paint schemes, 3 new challenges, and 50 state flag decals for you to add to your custom car! Expect paint schemes like the following:

name: NASCAR Heat 2 - September Jumbo Expansion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better

esrb.descriptors: Online Interactions not Rated by ESRB

short_description: The NASCAR Heat 2 – Jumbo Expansion 1 is chock-full of additional paint schemes from both the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series and XFINITY Series! This pack includes over 45 new paint schemes, 3 new challenges, and 50 state flag decals for you to add to your custom car!
